Azure Databricks - mind map - key concepts http://localhost:1313/posts/2024-10-22-azure-databricks-mindmap/ Tue, 22 Oct 2024 05:10:21 +0100 Author http://localhost:1313/posts/2024-10-22-azure-databricks-mindmap/ As part of my recent deep dive into Azure Databricks, I’ve created a mindmap that outlines and connects some of its core concepts. Explore essential areas like: 📊 Data Management 🗄️: Centralized governance, cataloging, and access control. 🛠️ Data Engineering 📊: Tools for building data pipelines, notebooks, and version control.
